original_text: And they two made a covenant before the Lord: and David abode in the wood, and Jonathan went to his house.
korean_text: 두 사람이 여호와 앞에서 언약하고 다윗은 수풀에 머물고 요나단은 자기 집으로 돌아가니라

sentences.original_text: And they two made a covenant before the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 그들 둘은 주 앞에서 언약을 맺었고

sentences.original_text: and David abode in the wood
and Jonathan went to his house
